articles.title: Blood moon eclipse to occur this weekend - ABC News
articles.description: Each stage of the lunar eclipse will be visible to residents in the eastern half of the U.S. and all of South America on Sunday night.

articles.title: Reggie Fils-Aimé talks web3, AR and his gaming SPAC - TechCrunch
articles.description: Former Nintendo of America president and COO Reggie Fils-Aimé discusses his journey with the gaming giant.
articles.content: In February 2019, Reggie Fils-Aimé announced that he would be leaving Nintendo after 16 years — 13 of which were spent as the president and COO of the companys North American division. It was a fruit… [+9823 chars]

articles.author: Luke Andrews
articles.title: Baby fox tests positive for BIRD FLU in Minnesota, officials reveal - Daily Mail
articles.description: It is believed to be the first confirmed case of bird flu in a fox in America, and the third in the world after two cases were also spotted in Ontario, Canada, last week.
articles.content:
A baby fox has tested positive for bird flu H5N1 in Minnesota, state officials revealed Wednesday, in the first case to be reported in a wild mammal in America.

articles.title: Annual inflation in US higher than expected in April, Aussie dollar dropped | Finance Report - ABC News (Australia)
articles.description: Share markets and the Australian dollar all fell today after American inflation came in higher than expected. Subscribe: http://ab.co/1svxLVE  Read more here...

articles.title: Scientists Say Stroke Treatment and Research Should Include People With Disabilities and Dementia - Everyday Health
articles.description: American Heart Association and the American Stroke Association issued a joint statement on the need to improve stroke outcomes in people with disabilities to provide better care to this historically underserved population.
